data.text:
A little while after I became Maruzensky's trainer— 
The day of her debut race had finally arrived.
data.processed:
󠁿A little while after I became Maruzensky's trainer— 
󠁿The day of her debut race had finally arrived.

data.text:
Aww, trainer! You came all the way down 
here to see me off? Hmhm, thanks.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
󠁿Aww, trainer! You came all the way down 
󠁿here to see me off? Hmhm, thanks.

data.text:
Aww, trainer! You came all the way down 
here to see me off? Hmhm, thanks.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
󠁿Aww, trainer! You came all the way down 
󠁿here to see me off? Hmhm, thanks.

data.text: Sound as a pound♪ It's been a beautiful day after all.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: 󠁿Sound as a pound♪ It's been a beautiful day after all.

data.text:
Besides, there's something special about feeling the wind on the 
race track. Now that I'm here I'm going to make the most of it!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
󠁿Besides, there's something special about feeling the wind on the 
󠁿race track. Now that I'm here I'm going to make the most of it!

data.text: Well then, I'm offff!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: 󠁿Well then, I'm offff!

data.text:
She smiled and laughed as she always does, and 
put her skills on full display in the race.
data.processed:
󠁿She smiled and laughed as she always does, and 
󠁿put her skills on full display in the race.

data.text:
—Approaching the fourth corner, Maruzensky leads! She's had the 
lead from the start and shows no signs of giving it up!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
󠁿—Approaching the fourth corner, Maruzensky leads! She's had the 
󠁿lead from the start and shows no signs of giving it up!

data.text: Fuu, fuu, fuu…
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: 󠁿Fuu, fuu, fuu…

data.text: … There's still more in my legs!!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: 󠁿… There's still more in my legs!!

data.text:
Maruzensky speeds up further! She's leaving everyone so far 
behind they probably can't even see her anymore!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
󠁿Maruzensky speeds up further! She's leaving everyone so far 
󠁿behind they probably can't even see her anymore!

data.text: Ha, hah, ha…!!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: 󠁿Ha, hah, ha…!!

data.text:
Maruzensky crosses the line with second place 
nowhere in sight!! How's that for a debut!?
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
󠁿Maruzensky crosses the line with second place 
󠁿nowhere in sight!! How's that for a debut!?

data.text: —A second later, thunderous cheers erupted from the stands.
data.processed: 󠁿—A second later, thunderous cheers erupted from the stands.

data.text: Sorry to keep you, trainer♪ Let's go home—
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: 󠁿Sorry to keep you, trainer♪ Let's go home—

data.text: I'm all good now, trainer♪ Let's go home—
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: 󠁿I'm all good now, trainer♪ Let's go home—

data.text: It's here… the day's finally here!! It's time for your debut!!
data.name: Average Trainer A
data.processed: 󠁿It's here… the day's finally here!! It's time for your debut!!

data.text:
Yes, trainer! I'm going to win this race! It will be my first 
step to becoming a Triple Crown horsegirl!
data.name: Horsegirl A
data.processed:
󠁿Yes, trainer! I'm going to win this race! It will be my first 
󠁿step to becoming a Triple Crown horsegirl!

data.text:
That's the spirit! I know you can do it! 
Show 'em what we've been training for!!
data.name: Average Trainer A
data.processed:
󠁿That's the spirit! I know you can do it! 
󠁿Show 'em what we've been training for!!

data.text: Yeeeeaaaaaah!!
data.name: Both
data.processed: 󠁿Yeeeeaaaaaah!!

data.text: What? Oh, no, it's just…
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: 󠁿What? Oh, no, it's just…

data.text:
… Hey, once we get back to the school we'll be done for the day, 
right? Do you have any plans after?
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
󠁿… Hey, once we get back to the school we'll be done for the day, 
󠁿right? Do you have any plans after?

data.text:
… Hey, once we get back to the school we'll be done for the day, 
right? Do you have any plans after?
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
󠁿… Hey, once we get back to the school we'll be done for the day, 
󠁿right? Do you have any plans after?

data.text: If you're free… maybe we can go for a drive together?
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: 󠁿If you're free… maybe we can go for a drive together?

data.text:
Yeah. What do you think? Up for it? I'll come get you then! Can 
you wait for me at the gate when we get back?
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
󠁿Yeah. What do you think? Up for it? I'll come get you then! Can 
󠁿you wait for me at the gate when we get back?

data.text: And so, as I waited on her at the gate…
data.processed: 󠁿And so, as I waited on her at the gate…

data.text: (Vrrrroovrroooooom!! Screeech…)
data.processed: 󠁿(Vrrrroovrroooooom!! Screeech…)

data.text: Hi, trainer♪
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: 󠁿Hi, trainer♪

data.text: Hi, trainer♪
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: 󠁿Hi, trainer♪

data.text: … A low, bright red car pulled up, and out stepped Maruzensky.
data.processed: 󠁿… A low, bright red car pulled up, and out stepped Maruzensky.

data.text: My, what's the blank stare for, something happen?
data.name: Maruzensky

choices.text: That's a hell of a car…

data.processed: 󠁿My, what's the blank stare for, something happen?

data.text: Isn't she just～!? Amazing, right!? This is my buddy; Tacchan!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: 󠁿Isn't she just～!? Amazing, right!? This is my buddy; Tacchan!

data.text:
Her slender, nifty body and the low roar of her 
engine…… They call these scissor doors, isn't 
it charming how they open vertically～!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
󠁿Her slender, nifty body and the low roar of her 
󠁿engine…… They call these scissor doors, isn't 
󠁿it charming how they open vertically～!

data.text:
Of course her ride's great too! Hop in, 
hop in, you'll have a great time!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
󠁿Of course her ride's great too! Hop in, 
󠁿hop in, you'll have a great time!

data.text: Thus invited, I boarded Maruzensky's "buddy"…
data.processed: 󠁿Thus invited, I boarded Maruzensky's "buddy"…

data.text:
Don't you love this acceleration! The scenery rushing by? But 
this is where Tacchan really starts to shine～!!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
󠁿Don't you love this acceleration! The scenery rushing by? But 
󠁿this is where Tacchan really starts to shine～!!

data.text:
No worries, no worries, I'll obey the traffic rules! 
I'm just… pushing them a little!!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
󠁿No worries, no worries, I'll obey the traffic rules! 
󠁿I'm just… pushing them a little!!

data.text: (Vrrrrvrrrooooooom!!)
data.processed: 󠁿(Vrrrrvrrrooooooom!!)

data.text: —I had an… extraordinarily thrilling time.
data.processed: 󠁿—I had an… extraordinarily thrilling time.

data.text:
Oooooooh, that felt so good～…! Our carefree 
drive ends at the beach… oh, how romantic!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
󠁿Oooooooh, that felt so good～…! Our carefree 
󠁿drive ends at the beach… oh, how romantic!

data.text:
What'd you think, trainer? My Tacchan 
must have been a heavenly ride!
data.name: Maruzensky

choices.text: I think I did see heaven a few times…

data.processed:
󠁿What'd you think, trainer? My Tacchan 
󠁿must have been a heavenly ride!

data.text: How was it, Trainer? My Tacchan must have been a heavenly ride!
data.name: Maruzensky

choices.text: I think I did see heaven a few times…

data.processed: 󠁿How was it, Trainer? My Tacchan must have been a heavenly ride!

data.text: Mmm, mmm! I'm glad you had a good time♪
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: 󠁿Mmm, mmm! I'm glad you had a good time♪

data.text:
—Driving's great isn't it? When you let the speed take over, it's 
like you become the wind, and you feel like you can go anywhere.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
󠁿—Driving's great isn't it? When you let the speed take over, it's 
󠁿like you become the wind, and you feel like you can go anywhere.

data.text:
Being able to enjoy that feeling, that joy, with my own body… 
I'm truly happy to be born a horsegirl.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
󠁿Being able to enjoy that feeling, that joy, with my own body… 
󠁿I'm truly happy to be born a horsegirl.

data.text:
The pleasure of going faster than the wind, feeling it rush by 
with my whole body… There's nothing else like it!
data.name: Maruzensky

choices.text: You really like to run, don't you?
You really like to run, don't you?

data.processed:
󠁿The pleasure of going faster than the wind, feeling it rush by 
󠁿with my whole body… There's nothing else like it!

data.text: Yeah, of course! …But you know, that's really it, to me.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: 󠁿Yeah, of course! …But you know, that's really it, to me.

data.text:
I don't have any of those… dazzling dreams 
or lofty goals, like everyone else…
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
󠁿I don't have any of those… dazzling dreams 
󠁿or lofty goals, like everyone else…

data.text: Don't get me wrong, I love to run and race. I just—
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: 󠁿Don't get me wrong, I love to run and race. I just—

data.text:
When I'm in a serious competition like today, where everyone's 
dreams collide… I can't help but think "am I out of place?".
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
󠁿When I'm in a serious competition like today, where everyone's 
󠁿dreams collide… I can't help but think "am I out of place?".

data.text:
… Dearie me, I'm getting all soppy! We've finally gone on our 
first drive together, I can't be doing this!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
󠁿… Dearie me, I'm getting all soppy! We've finally gone on our 
󠁿first drive together, I can't be doing this!

data.text:
… Dearie me, look at me getting all soppy! We've finally gone on 
our first drive together, I can't be doing this!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
󠁿… Dearie me, look at me getting all soppy! We've finally gone on 
󠁿our first drive together, I can't be doing this!

data.text:
Oh, yeah! Since we're at the beach, why don't we play tag? 
You know, like in those trendy dramas!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
󠁿Oh, yeah! Since we're at the beach, why don't we play tag? 
󠁿You know, like in those trendy dramas!

data.text: I'll be running away. —Ehehehe, come and catch me if you ca～aan♪
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: 󠁿I'll be running away. —Ehehehe, come and catch me if you ca～aan♪

data.text:
"I don't have any of those dreams or goals" …On that 
day, I felt I caught a glimpse of her true self she 
keeps hidden beneath that mature smile.
data.processed:
󠁿"I don't have any of those dreams or goals" …On that 
󠁿day, I felt I caught a glimpse of her true self she 
󠁿keeps hidden beneath that mature smile.

data.text: Ehehehe, ahahahaha♪
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: 󠁿Ehehehe, ahahahaha♪

data.text: (Thudududud!!)

choices.text: …Hang on, there's no way I'm catching you!
choices.processed: <size=37>…Hang on, there's no way I'm catching you!</size>

choices.text: …Hang on, there's no way I'm catching you!
choices.processed: <size=37>…Hang on, there's no way I'm catching you!</size>

data.processed: 󠁿(Thudududud!!)

data.text: Aww don't say that! You can do it, trainer～♪
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: 󠁿Aww don't say that! You can do it, trainer～♪

data.text: Aww don't say that! Show me your best effort～♪
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: 󠁿Aww don't say that! Show me your best effort～♪

title: I Simply Wish To Become the Wind
